question: For about 6 months I have experienced a tingling sensation when I touch my scalp or face.  The sensation lingers for a second or two then disappears.  One of the first things I think about would be diabetes.  My sugar has been in the low 140's in my last couple of checkups.  I don't drink water excessively (never alcohol) and I try to obstain from sweets (most times), but I do eat excess carbs.
title: Nerve disorder?
